txt_en: I belong to myself.
Nobody else gets to tell you what your story is.
Love is beautiful. Love is wonderful.
Trust takes time.
You need to take responsibility for your life.
txt_cn: 你应该对自己的人生负责。

txt_en: True wealth is measured in friendships.
Sometimes your whole life boils down to one insane move.
txt_cn: 人生的转机有时就得靠一次疯狂的举动。

txt_en: You're the one who can fill the world with sunshine.
txt_cn: 是你让世界每一处都充满了阳光。

txt_en: Everybody has their dreams.
We get to decide how we should live.
txt_cn: 要怎么活着，由我们自己做主。

txt_en: The most ordinary person can change the world.
txt_cn: 平凡之人亦能改变世界。

txt_en: Follow your instincts and do what you think is right.
txt_cn: 听从自己的直觉，做正确之事。

txt_en: Growth brings change.
Real love is always worth waiting for.
Focus on the details.
Nobody can do everything.
We can help each other.
Change can be good sometimes.
You must be yourself.
I want to do something important.
Everyone is special in their own way.
txt_cn: 每个人都是独一无二的。
